alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Seneca; Wood; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 11:25AM EDT until April 01 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT FOR OTTAWA...SENECA...WYANDOT...SANDUSKY...CRAWFORD...WOOD...EASTERN HANCOCK AND LUCAS COUNTIES... At 1124 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Oak Harbor to near Bloomville to near Morral, moving east at 70 mph. Wind gusts in excess of 50 mph are continuing even after the thunderstorms exit. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Findlay, Bowling Green, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Galion, Bellevue, Clyde, Rossford, Waterville and Northwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Seneca; Wood; Wyandot
